yaml.pagetitle: Jitin Kapila | AI Strategy & Enterprise Architecture
yaml.description: Transform from Corporate AI Lead to Strategic AI Architect. The AI-ART Matrix and OLCD Protocol for Fortune 500 enterprises. 14 years cross-industry AI implementation experience.

markdown.markdown:
::: {.hero-content} [The AI Protocol]{.eyebrow} **I help Senior Professionals & Business Owners build AI-Enabled Enterprises.** No theory. No "prompt engineering" fluff. Just operational leverage. ::: {.hero-buttons} [Join the Bootcamp (Tier 1)](https://YOUR-SYSTEME-IO-LINK.com){.btn-primary .btn-large} [Explore Consulting (Tier 2)](https://cal.com/jitink-kriyalytics/strategy-consulting){.btn-secondary .btn-large target="_blank"} ::: ::: ```{=html}
Strategies Deployed At
``` ::: {.fixed-section} ## The Thesis You are managing ₹80M+ portfolios. You have 15 years of experience. **But you are still doing manual work.** The market is shifting. Senior professionals are not being replaced by AI; they are being replaced by *junior* professionals who have **Operational Leverage**. I am **Jitin Kapila**. I am not a "Course Creator." I am an **AI Architect** who has deployed systems for Fortune 500 companies. My goal is simple: to help you move from "Corporate Employee" to "AI-Enabled Executive." ::: ::: {.fixed-section .bg-navy .text-white} ## The Case Study: 182x ROI **The Problem:** A regional grocery chain losing ₹7.5Cr/year to inventory spoilage. **The "Architect" Fix:** We didn't hire a data team. We installed a **Predictive Ordering Agent** using simple Excel + OpenAI API. * **Before:** 20 hours/week manual ordering. * **After:** 2 hours/week automated review. * **Result:** ₹8.2Cr profit increase in Year 1. *This is not magic. It is Architecture.* ::: ::: {.section} ## How We Work Together I offer two distinct protocols depending on your speed and needs. ::: {.grid} ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6} ### Tier 1: The AI Profit OS™ **3-Day Implementation Bootcamp** For leaders who want to build their personal AI Operating System in one weekend. We install the **Deep-Research System**, the **Governance Playbook**, and your first **Agentic Workflow**. * **Format:** Live Virtual Sprint (3 Days) * **Next Cohort:** Dec 19-21, 2025 * **Investment:** ~~₹15,999~~ **₹7,999 (Founding Member)** [Secure Your Seat →](https://YOUR-SYSTEME-IO-LINK.com){.btn-primary} ::: ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6} ### Tier 2: The AI Profit Accelerator™ **4-Week Consulting Program** For business owners who need a full **AI-ART Matrix** deployment across Sales, Ops, and HR. We audit your Data Assets, design your Multi-Agent System, and build the "Bird's-Eye View" Dashboard. * **Format:** Hybrid Consulting (Small Cohort) * **Status:** Application Only * **Investment:** ₹50,000+ [Let's have a word →](https://cal.com/jitink-kriyalytics/strategy-consulting){.btn-primary target="_blank"} ::: ::: ::: {.fixed-section .bg-warm .text-center} ## The "Unheard Of" Guarantee My reputation is built on ROI, not views. If you join the **AI Profit OS™** and do not save at least 10 hours/week within 30 days, I will refund you 100% **AND** pay you ₹5,000 for your time. **Stop Guessing. Start Architecting.** [Start The Protocol (₹7,999)](https://YOUR-SYSTEME-IO-LINK.com){.btn-primary .btn-large} :::
